Kahimi Karie_ZOOM UP !.music danceability: Medium because while the rhythm is steady, it is designed more for listening than dancing.

Kahimi Karie_ZOOM UP !.mode: Minor because the lyrical content and emotional tone suggest a darker, introspective quality.
